name: Djelvian Escape
description:
A game to show off engine capabilities, focused on storytelling in a 2D sidescrolling format. Follow a young Djelvian through their journey to escape the Skia hunting his species, and learn about the wars that divided their family.

Currently in development, the demo available now is very cut down as some basic mechanics are still being worked on.

Find out more at: https://www.ecroso.com/djelvian-escape
